summary: This document contains email correspondence regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and members of the Deutsche Bank team. Amanda Kirby discusses the availability of Epstein and proposes alternative dates for the meeting.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.context: Lesley Groff is involved in scheduling the meeting with Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating meetings for Jeffrey Epstein as part of her role at Deutsche Bank.
Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are both involved in scheduling meetings for Epstein.
Paul Morris is part of the Deutsche Bank team managing Epstein's accounts.
Harry provided information to Amanda Kirby regarding Epstein's meeting request.

events.title: Proposed Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting was proposed to take place with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

events.title: Email Correspondence
events.description: Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff exchanged emails regarding scheduling a meeting with Epstein.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein for the week of October 8.
Lesley Groff is involved in scheduling the meeting and communicating with Kirby.
Paul Morris is part of the Deutsche Bank team managing Epstein's accounts.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.
The meeting was initially proposed for October 8 but was suggested to be moved to October 10.
